message.body: Hey, Akiha sent you a message.
Hey John! Yes she did :) so sweet! I responded, did she not get it?
Oh. She probably did between the time she sent it and I sent this message, lol
I just wanted to let you know in case you didn't check your Facebook messages.
Oh thanks! Yup I saw it, we're going to be spending some time together in March homes! Pow pow!
It was really good. We went to Vegas, Death Valley, and San Francisco.
Whoa! You definitely had fun. Vegas and San Fran are good places. I especially want to see the latter again. How was Death Valley?
Death Valley was my favorite place. I actually didn't find Vegas that great.
Highlights were probably a show we saw, the buffets, and a game center in one of the hotels.
I think it's the name that intimidates me. Is it a lot of dessert?
It's a gigantic desert with hills, mountains, canyons, and sand dunes.
That's what I pretty much did in Vegas too. Seeing that we're not big gamblers (I assume), that's pretty much what there is left to do there hahah.
That's what I thought. I want to see it!!! You took pictures right?!
Yeah, I'll show you in March. :p
